name: Home is What You Make it
name_original: Home is What You Make it
description:
Home is where we feel safe enough to let our imaginations run wild. Explore your home and imagination as a small child, venture through perilous dangers and collect what you need to build your pillow fort.

Enjoy the game we made for Global Game Jam 2019. This version has some updates from the game jam version which can be found here: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/home-what-you-make-it
